name: ResourceDescriptor
title: Gcloud
Logging
ResourceDescriptor
description:
ResourceDescriptor

Describes a type of monitored resource supported by Cloud Logging. Each ResourceDescriptor has a type name, such as cloudsql_database, gae_app, or gce_instance. It also specifies a set of labels that must all be given values in a Resource instance to represent an actual instance of the type.

ResourceDescriptor instances are read-only. You cannot create your own instances, but you can list them with Project#resource_descriptors.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
logging = gcloud.logging
resource_descriptor = logging.resource_descriptors.first
resource_descriptor.type #=> "cloudsql_database"
resource_descriptor.name #=> "Cloud SQL Database"
resource_descriptor.labels.map &:key #=> ["database_id", "region"]

methods.name: name
title: Gcloud
Logging
ResourceDescriptor#name
methods.description: A display name for the monitored resource type. For example, Cloud SQL Database.

methods.name: description
title: Gcloud
Logging
ResourceDescriptor#description
methods.description: A detailed description of the monitored resource type, which is used in documentation.

methods.name: labels
title: Gcloud
Logging
ResourceDescriptor#labels
methods.description: A set of definitions of the labels that can be used to describe instances of this monitored resource type. For example, Cloud SQL databases must be labeled with their database_id and their region.
